description:
Can't read any files in your source directories.
(Maybe only if they are under $HOME which NO-ONE uses...

Great Tool but not so much informative as the online-tool.

But unfortunly my scripts have some (okay much) comments and with that the online tool can't work, it results always "Sandbox resource constraints exceeded. Try a smaller script, or run ShellCheck locally."
Okay then i have to use this tool here.

But can you add in also positive result? Currently this local tool results (used in terminal) failures only and show suggestions.
Also it will be great, if i can check shell scripts arround the computer and not only in /home/ path
summary: Great Tool - But it can be better ;-)
